fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.util.gl

Class GLProgram

  • Object
    • GLProgram

  • public class GLProgram
extends Object
    Author:
    JeT A GLProgram is equivalent to a gl-program with gl Uniform data management

        public int getUniformLocation(String uniformName)

      • addShader

        public void addShader(GLShader shader)
        Set fragment shader
        Parameters:
        fragShader - shader id generated by glGenShader
        filename - file containing the shader content. It can be null, it is used only to display the filename when an error occured

      • createVertexShader

        public static final int createVertexShader(String shaderContent,
                                           String filename)
                                    throws GLException
        Try to create a compiled vertex shader
        Parameters:
        shaderContent - shader content as string
        filename - file containing the shader content. It can be null, it is used only to display the filename when an error occured
        Returns:
        the shader id
        Throws:
        GLException - on shader creation error

        GLException - on shader creation error
